DataElement.preferredName: Fertile Female Patient Refuse Contraceptive Device Assessment Ind-3b
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicates yes/no/not applicable as to whether a woman of child-bearing potential refuses birth control.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Fertile Female Patient Refuse Contraceptive Device Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Whether a woman of child-bearing potential refuses birth control.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Able to produce children.:A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.:A device designed to prevent conception through local or systemic effect, such as a barrier contraceptive, an intrauterine device, or a means of preventing ovulation (e.g., birth control pill).:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.
A device designed to prevent conception through local or systemic effect, such as a barrier contraceptive, an intrauterine device, or a means of preventing ovulation (e.g., birth control pill).
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Female subject of child-beari
ReferenceDocuments.description: Female subject of child-bearing potential not willing to use an acceptable method of birth control (i.e, a hormonal contraceptive, intra-uterine device, diaphragm with spermicide, condom with spermicide, or abstinence) for the duration of the study and one year beyond treatment completion

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-3b 2958018v1 with VD ID#3506036 - Yes No Not Applicable Indicator - dbw
